alert.note: Alert for Antrim; Charlevoix; Cheboygan; Emmet (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Cheboygan, northwestern Antrim, southern Emmet and Charlevoix Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, the public reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Harbor Springs to near Norwood. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Petoskey, Boyne City, East Jordan, Harbor Springs, Conway, Alanson, Ironton, Petoskey State Park, Horton Bay and Young State Park around 625 PM EDT. Burt Lake, Clarion, Brutus and Walloon Lake around 630 PM EDT. Indian River and Reasoners Corner around 635 PM EDT. Burt Lake State Park and Topinabee around 640 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
